import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isScrolled,setIsScrolled]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const scrollTop=window.scrollY;setIsScrolled(scrollTop>50);// Change to white after 50px scroll
};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);const handleNavigation=path=>{navigate(path);window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:'smooth'});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header ".concat(isScrolled?'scrolled':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"logo",children:"Secmondo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tagline",children:"We make dreams secure."})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/'),className:"nav-link",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/about'),className:"nav-link",children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/contact'),className:"nav-link",children:"Contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/quote'),className:"nav-link nav-link-cta",children:"GET QUOTE"})]})]})});};export default Header;
